hero.title: Beautiful UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.
hero.description: Accessible, composable, and customizable components that you can copy and paste into your apps. Free and open source.

chat.title: Chat Interface Template
chat.description: A modern, responsive chat application layout with contact list and message area. Perfect for building messaging apps or support chat tools.

features.sidebar: Sidebar Contact List: Searchable user list with online status indicators.
features.messageArea: Message Area: Distinct styles for incoming and outgoing messages.
features.scrollArea: ScrollArea Integration: Uses custom scrollbars for a native app feel.
features.responsive: Responsive: Sidebar adapts to mobile screens.

projectBoard.title: Project Board Template
projectBoard.description: A fully functional Kanban board for task management. Drag and drop tasks, organize your workflow, and manage project progress effortlessly.

features.dragDrop: Drag & Drop: Built with @dnd-kit for smooth accessible drag-and-drop interactions.
features.optimisticUi: Optimistic UI: Instant state updates for better user experience.
features.columns: Column Management: Pre-configured statuses (ToDo, In Progress, Done) that can be extended.
features.responsive: Responsive: Works on desktop and tablet devices.

activityFeed.title: Activity Feed Template
activityFeed.description: A responsive timeline and activity feed template. Ideal for displaying user history, changelogs, or system notifications.

features.timeline: Timeline Layout: Vertical timeline with connected dots and lines.
features.richContent: Rich Content: Support for icons, titles, dates, descriptions, and call-to-action buttons.
features.filters: Filters: Sidebar with filter options (All Activity, Mentions, etc.).
features.responsive: Responsive: Adapts to different screen sizes.

auth.title: Authentication Templates
auth.description: Pre-built, responsive login and registration forms using react-hook-form and zod. Includes validation, error handling, and mock Supabase integration.

features.validation: Form Validation: Built-in validation using zod schemas for robust data handling.
features.state: State Integration: Uses react-hook-form for efficient form state management.
features.supabase: Supabase Ready: Pre-configured async handlers for Supabase authentication methods.
features.responsive: Responsive Design: Fully responsive layouts that adapt to all device sizes.

projectBoard.title: Project Board
projectBoard.subtitle: Manage your tasks and track progress.

activityFeed.title: Activity Feed
activityFeed.subtitle: Recent actions and updates across the platform.

auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account
auth.signUpSubtitle: Enter your information to create an account
